thread.title: Italian markets jolted by 5-Star, League proposals

title: Italian markets jolted by 5-Star, League proposals
text:
Italian markets jolted by 5-Star, League proposals Wednesday, May 16, 2018 - 01:44
Italy's borrowing costs jumped on Wednesday and its stocks slid after a draft programme for a potential coalition government revealed plans to demand 250 billion euros of debt forgiveness and create procedures to allow countries to exit the euro. David Pollard reports.
